item.title: Java - The Learning Experience 1
item.description: Chapter 1 & 2 Introduction to Objects Background Java technology includes Java programming languages and Java platform 文件扩展名 .java 被编译器javac编译成 .class 文件-Java虚拟机的机器语言，再通过Java启动器工具使用JavaVM的实例运行应用程序 Java Platform has two components: The Java Virtual Machine(JavaVM) and The Java Application Programming Interface (API) The API(https://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/index.html) is a large collection of ready-made software components. The API provides many useful capabilities: It is grouped into libraries of related classes and interfaces; These libraries are known as packages .
